The look of the piece is much like Kanenori (18th century)of Aizu in 
Iwash=
iro province who did AOI style pieces with the same metel 
colour, rounded =
mimi and heavier feel.  There is some controversy if 
he was the same as Ka=
nenori of Sendai in Rikuzen province but Haynes 
feels they are different t=
subako.  My other thoughts had been later 
Myochin or Umetada but have been=
 ruled out.
